QuestData.Title: Jungo, Herald of G'huun
QuestData.Description:
Dis is it, $n. De blood magic is weakened enough dat we can actually hurt de herald of G'huun.
It is going to take all of us fighting dis thing to stop it. We will meet you inside of Torga.
We cannot lose here. If de blood trolls control Torga's blood, den dere will be no way for us to stop dem.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Jungo's power is immense. It must be stopped before it can attack Zuldazar!
